name: New Moon
text: New Moon is when the Moon is between the Earth and the Sun.

name: First Quarter
text: First Quarter is when the Moon is halfway to being full.

name: Full Moon
text: Full Moon is when Earth is between the Moon and the Sun.

name: Last Quarter
text: Last Quarter is when the Moon is halfway to being new.

name: New Moon
text: During New Moon, the Moon is invisible as it's between Earth and the Sun.

name: First Quarter
text: In the First Quarter, the Moon is half visible.

name: Full Moon
text: During Full Moon, the Moon is fully illuminated by the Sun.

name: Last Quarter
text: In the Last Quarter, we see only half of the Moon.

name: New Moon
text: New Moon phase is ideal for observing stars and galaxies.

name: First Quarter
text: First Quarter is a good time to observe the Moon's surface.
